alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:57PM CDT until June 12 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SUNFLOWER...WASHINGTON AND NORTHWESTERN HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 1057 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leland, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Arcola and Tribbett around 1115 PM CDT. Estill around 1120 PM CDT. Hollandale and Darlove around 1125 PM CDT. Murphy around 1140 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
